server-unreachable: Could not make a connection to the server!
could-not-connect:
Either...

  • there's a problem with your internet connection.
  • or the server is unreachable, please contact info@d-pac.be.
bad-credentials: Incorrect password or e-mail, please try again!
please-contact: An unspecified error has occured, please contact info@d-pac.eu.
auto-recover: The application will automatically recover once the connection is restored.
